DOC.brief_summary: To collect additional data relating to safety and indicators of efficacy for patients who have participated in the 1160.113 study.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Completed study 1160.113 per protocol 2. Continuing need for anticoagulation Exclusion criteria: 1. uncontrolled hypertension 2. severe renal impairment 3. active liver disease 4. increased risk of bleeding
